EmailTemplate.name: PasswordExpiredNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Password has Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Password has Expired
Dear {!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.Contact__c},
Your password has expired. Please click on the below link to reset your password.
https://qmyaerospace.honeywell.com/account/forgot-password
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
